title: Pixel 3 can't make a call. Mobile network not available message. Restart resolves the issue.
content:
I just bought a Pixel 3.  Consistently I am unable to make a phone call.  It tries to dial but there is no ringing sound and eventually I get an error message that says "Mobile network not available".  

Restarting the phone allows me to make a call every time.   This, to me, implies it is not a setting or configuration issue since it works on restart.

Is there a known problem with Pixel 3's?
